Dependency=ASHRAE IECC Climate Zone 2004: # Source: Constructed using U.S. EIA 2009 Residential Energy Consumption Survey (RECS) microdata.

# Assumptions: RECS data is queried from two building type groups: 1) Single-Family Detached and Mobile Homes and 2) Single-Family Attached, Multi-family with 2-4 Units, and Multi-Family with 5+ Units
# Assumptions: Due to lack of data for multi-family and single-family attached buildings in zone 4C, data for single-family detached buildings in zone 4C are used
